name: The Experiment
description:
‘The Experiment’ is a fast paced experience about killing a mutated human. Your flashlight is essential to your survival, use it sparingly. Collect all the hidden bottles and use the X-ray machine to kill the lurking creature.


'The Experiment' is a First Person Survival Horror Game. You will need to explore locations and pickup bottles you find. After you meet the required amount, you can feed them into the X-Ray machine. Use the high amounts of radiation from the machine to zap the creature.
Easier said than done... The experiment roams the halls and is hostile toward other humans. Your flashlight lights up the room, but be careful to not consume all your battery as it is limited.
Your ears will be very handy to locate the enemy.
